title: IPL 2025: Who are the Australia players registered for the auction?
description: The player list for the IPL 2025 auction was finalised on Friday (November 15). Here are all the Australian players to make the shortlist.
author: Rahul Iyer
excerpt: The player list for the IPL 2025 auction was finalised on Friday (November 15). Here are all the Australian players to make the shortlist.
text: The player list for the IPL 2025 auction was finalised on Friday (November 15). Here are all the Australian players to make the shortlist. The auction registration list of 1,574 players has been trimmed to 574 players, which includes 208 overseas players. There are 70 available slots for the overseas players to fill, across the 10 teams. As far as Australian players are concerned, 76 of them registered for the auction, with 37 making it to the final shortlist. A few notable names that did not are Ben Cutting, Moises Henriques, Matthew Kuhnemann, Chris Lynn, Nathan Lyon, Todd Murphy and new Test opener Nathan McSweeney. Eleven of the players on the shortlist – Ashton Agar, Xavier Bartlett, Hilton Cartwright, Cooper Connolly, Aaron Hardie, Josh Inglis, Ben McDermott, Lance Morris, Tanveer Sangha, Josh Brown and Will Sutherland – have not played in the IPL before. Two players, Michael Neser and Josh Brown, were not on the long list, but were added to the shortlist after consultation with the franchises. Full list of Australian players and base prices in IPL 2025 auction Mitchell Starc - INR 2 crore Jake Fraser-McGurk - INR 2 crore David Warner - INR 2 crore Mitchell Marsh - INR 2 crore Glenn Maxwell - INR 2 crore Marcus Stoinis - INR 2 crore Josh Hazlewood - INR 2 crore Adam Zampa - INR 2 crore Josh Inglis - INR 2 crore Tim David - INR 2 crore Spencer Johnson - INR 2 crore Steve Smith - INR 2 crore Sean Abbott - INR 2 crore Alex Carey - INR 1 crore Joshua Brown - INR 0.3 crore Oliver Davies - INR 0.3 crore Ashton Turner - INR 1 crore Jason Behrendorff - INR 1.5 crore Jhye Richardson - INR 1.5 crore Aaron Hardie - INR 1.25 crore Daniel Sams - INR 1.5 crore Chris Green - INR 1 crore Nathan Ellis - INR 1.25 crore Lance Morris - INR 1.25 crore Riley Meredith - INR 1.5 crore Ben McDermott - INR 0.75 crore Josh Philippe - INR 0.75 crore Tanveer Sangha - INR 0.75 crore Ashton Agar - INR 1.25 crore Matthew Short - INR 0.75 crore Xavier Bartlett - INR 0.75 crore Cooper Connolly - INR 0.75 crore William Sutherland - INR 0.75 crore Ben Dwarshuis - INR 0.75 crore Hilton Cartwright - INR 0.75 crore Michael Neser - INR 0.75 crore Andrew Tye - INR 0.75 crore Follow Wisden for all cricket updates, including live scores, match stats, quizzes and more. html:
The player list for the IPL 2025 auction was finalised on Friday (November 15). Here are all the Australian players to make the shortlist.

The auction registration list of 1,574 players has been trimmed to 574 players, which includes 208 overseas players. There are 70 available slots for the overseas players to fill, across the 10 teams.

As far as Australian players are concerned, 76 of them registered for the auction, with 37 making it to the final shortlist. A few notable names that did not are Ben Cutting, Moises Henriques, Matthew Kuhnemann, Chris Lynn, Nathan Lyon, Todd Murphy and new Test opener Nathan McSweeney.

Eleven of the players on the shortlist – Ashton Agar, Xavier Bartlett, Hilton Cartwright, Cooper Connolly, Aaron Hardie, Josh Inglis, Ben McDermott, Lance Morris, Tanveer Sangha, Josh Brown and Will Sutherland – have not played in the IPL before. Two players, Michael Neser and Josh Brown, were not on the long list, but were added to the shortlist after consultation with the franchises.

Full list of Australian players and base prices in IPL 2025 auction

  • Mitchell Starc - INR 2 crore
  • Jake Fraser-McGurk - INR 2 crore
  • David Warner - INR 2 crore
  • Mitchell Marsh - INR 2 crore
  • Glenn Maxwell - INR 2 crore
  • Marcus Stoinis - INR 2 crore
  • Josh Hazlewood - INR 2 crore
  • Adam Zampa - INR 2 crore
  • Josh Inglis - INR 2 crore
  • Tim David - INR 2 crore
  • Spencer Johnson - INR 2 crore
  • Steve Smith - INR 2 crore
  • Sean Abbott - INR 2 crore
  • Alex Carey - INR 1 crore
  • Joshua Brown - INR 0.3 crore
  • Oliver Davies - INR 0.3 crore
  • Ashton Turner - INR 1 crore
  • Jason Behrendorff - INR 1.5 crore
  • Jhye Richardson - INR 1.5 crore
  • Aaron Hardie - INR 1.25 crore
  • Daniel Sams - INR 1.5 crore
  • Chris Green - INR 1 crore
  • Nathan Ellis - INR 1.25 crore
  • Lance Morris - INR 1.25 crore
  • Riley Meredith - INR 1.5 crore
  • Ben McDermott - INR 0.75 crore
  • Josh Philippe - INR 0.75 crore
  • Tanveer Sangha - INR 0.75 crore
  • Ashton Agar - INR 1.25 crore
  • Matthew Short - INR 0.75 crore
  • Xavier Bartlett - INR 0.75 crore
  • Cooper Connolly - INR 0.75 crore
  • William Sutherland - INR 0.75 crore
  • Ben Dwarshuis - INR 0.75 crore
  • Hilton Cartwright - INR 0.75 crore
  • Michael Neser - INR 0.75 crore
  • Andrew Tye - INR 0.75 crore
